RiderWaitingRideActivity - Class in com.example.quicar
rider has successfully sent out a request rider is waiting the system to pair them with a driver rider will get a notification if the match is successful rider is able to cancel ride before driver arrived at pick up location (rider can only cancel ride in a reasonable amount of time)
